name: R.E.V
description:
Accelerate full speed on Future Highways.

Survive by dodging Traffic and Police Drones. Use Boost and Bomb to your advantage. Navigate the Procedural environment and us it to your advantage to beat the Police Drones. Bask in the futuristic atmosphere and..

Escape the Law!!

Currently in Prototype - Will be updated with better AI and more enemy/Environment Types

Have fun and enjoy =)

Ps Please leave a comment, any feedback good or bad is very welcome
